package.name: Validate_FR
package.description: Package containes locale validation for FR such as: * SSN * Postal Code * RIB * SIREN * SIRET * Region (Departements)

release.notes: - Split from Validate into independent package - CS fixes - BC break! postalCode unified between countries (name wise), now all postcode validation funcs are named postalCode - added region() (departments) and postalCode
